gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.ext
Interface Session<A,L>

Type Parameters:
A - Type of authorization id.
L - Type of selected language.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bo2WicketSession, SessionImpl
public interface Session<A,L>

Interface for the session of a user in an application.

Method Summary
 L getLanguageId()
          Gets the id of the language used in this session.
 Locale getLocale()
           
 User<A> getUser()
          Gets the user.
 boolean isAuthorized(A authorizationId)
          Checks if this session is authorized for the action that is controlled by an authorization control identified with the authorizationId.
 boolean isLogin()
          Indicates if the user has been logged in.
 void setLanguageId(L languageId)
          Sets the language id for the session.

Gets the id of the language used in this session.

Returns the session language id.

setLanguageId

Sets the language id for the session.

Parameters:

getLocale

Locale getLocale()
Returns:
Returns the Session Locale.

isAuthorized

boolean isAuthorized(A authorizationId)
Checks if this session is authorized for the action that is controlled by an authorization control identified with the authorizationId. This method can delegate to the method of the user, but it exists also in the session, since a session could exist without a user.

Parameters:
authorizationId - Id of the authorization controlling the action.
Returns:
Returns true if the user is authorized for the action controlled by the specified is action.

isLogin

boolean isLogin()
Indicates if the user has been logged in.

Returns:
Returns true if the user has logged in, otherwise returns false.
